name: sampling_multinomial_v151936
description: Multinomial sampling from probability distribution over vocabulary (151936). Used in Qwen3 models.
reference:
import torch

@torch.no_grad()
def run(probs, num_samples):
    batch_size, vocab_size = probs.shape
    
    # Check constants
    assert vocab_size == 151936
    
    output = torch.multinomial(probs, num_samples)
    return output
